attributes.action: Stop trying to prevent boycott of companies linked to occupation of Palestine
attributes.additional_details:
It is time to show the good nature of the UK people. We do not want to live in a so called democracy but have no choice. Fairness for all should prevail. Let us speak against the government when their view does not mirror what the UK people think and want. 

The government is trying to remove choice of being able to not deal with companies involved in Palestinian land. Please show your support and your British values.
attributes.background: Stop trying to prevent boycott of companies linked to occupation of Palestinian land. The UK Government is trying to prevent local authorities from divesting from companies linked to Israel’s illegal occupation and settlements on Palestinian land. Authorities which refuse are also being targeted
